name: No Cook Pretzels with a Kick
author: CASADESCARLETT
summary: A spicy snack of pretzels with no baking required. Great for parties or poker night!
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch ®)
½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Place vegetable oil, ranch dressing mix, garlic powder, lemon pepper, and cayenne pepper in a gallon-size resealable bag; seal and gently shake to mix oil with dry ingredients
Add pretzels and seal bag; shake to thoroughly coat pretzels with seasoned oil
Let pretzels marinate in the bag for 30 minutes
Shake bag and marinate another 30 minutes
Transfer pretzels to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to dry
